column1: Little Goat Diner////Yum yum yummy yum yum!  Came here for lunch with 2 friends on a Monday afternoon.  It was busy
column2: but not insane.  We didn't even have to wait for a table.  I ordered the mushroom
column3: apple and cheddar quesadilla while my friends ordered the Fat club and Los something or other sandwich.  My quesadilla was DELISH and came with a healthy yogurt dipping sauce.  The brussel sprout salad it came with was so good too.  My friends sandwiches didn't come with any sides so they ordered a side order of fries
column4: and it was large enough for them to share.  The price of the sandwiches were a little more than the average diner
column5: especially because they didn't come with a side
column6: but they were so tasty that it didn't matter.  And after our meal we went next door to get a homemade pop tart.....worth the calories for sure!  Can't wait to go back and try the breakfast!  Oh
column7: and to take advantage of the rooftop in the summer :)
